item.title: How to Use Logging in Python
item.author: MartinLwx
item.description: Intro Recently I was fine-tuning my deep learning model, and I habitually started to use print to print some key information on the terminal. So my workflow is like: I type some hyperparameters to train my model. I manually opened an Excel to record the hyperparameters used and the model evaluation results. And I will go back to step 1. If I am not satisfied with results. Soon, I became bored with this workflow (In fact, I kept this for quite a long time.
